Многие убийцы слишком имбовые, такие как дух, свинья, майерс не советую играть в эту игру тем, кто не привык к каким то багам потому как в игре их очень много,  выжившие тряпки по сравнению с убийцами которые ничего не могут сделать. Изначально игра казалась очень классной, но потом понимаешь что ловить тут нечего. Выигрываешь только за счет неопытности многих игроков, но когда тебе попадается убийца который постоянно только спит и видит как он играет за убийцу и постоянно играет на нем, у вас шансов нет. Вам не советую покупать!!!
Incredibly fun game as either role, queue times are awful so be prepared to wait for a while between matches.

The game has a really cool idea. The execution is pretty bad. When I say that I mean they didn't test it for 'fun'. 

We played this game with 5-10 players and it's been.... not fun. 

Pros: The idea is cool, it's a great idea. I like that there's a hunter and hunted with different results.

Cons: It's not random. There's a pay-to-play mechanic. That on it's own is garbage! A friend payed more and destroyed us! It's stupid. There are too many options, it's not well playtested. I think it has promise, but in it's current state it's a game for people to get frustrated at each other. Also, get rid of microtransactions! If i knew they would be a part of it I wouldn't have bought it.

Edit/Addendum: You get used to the unfun aspects and the game becomes fun again. It's not ideal still, but it's the best in its class right now.

i definitely recommend Dead By Daylight!! its very much a love/hate relationship, a PHENOMENAL GAME but NEGATIVE COMMUNITY

pros:
-variety of different types of characters
-lots of great perks to experiment with
-plenty of opportunity to improve and practice, playing with friends publicly or even in a private custom
-tons of customization options: head, body, pants, and charms
-items/add on/offerings to help you in game
-devs frequently post on twitter, letting you know about codes for exclusive items or rewards


cons:
-new map hasn't been released in ages
-several glitches that haven't been fixed yet (hit boxes and pallet/flashlight stuns specifically)
-most console players cant see the pre-game or post-game chat
-extremely toxic community, been called slurs in 85% of post-game chats
-matchmaking is very unbalanced, i'm a rank 1 and i usually get matched with people who won't heal me, are immersed and hiding in corners, only self-care, sandbag, and etc.
-queue times are EXTREMELY long. sometimes wait ten minutes for a match that lasts one minute long after a terrible killer/teammates
The devs of this game are money hungry and the gameplay is repetitive and boring. The community is also full of a bunch of annoying children that are toxic and will defend the money hungry devs.

So you will start a game someone will DC, you will do multiple generators, outrun the killer, save and heal your remaining survivors, they all end up dying after you lose your sanity and pull your hair out of your head while watching them on a hook run around doing absolutely nothing, luckily you find hatch and escape and the ranking system thinks you deserve a -1 pip for a 15 minute game with only 3 survivors, survivors pip system is stupid and broken and makes absolutely 0 sense, All killers run the same 3 OP perks, the devs don't poll updates or new dlc and you cant even get all characters without spending money.  Don't get me started on the Ego's that Killers have its basically full of old emo weeb people who live off their parents, living in moms basement that forgot to shower in the last 3 days and they think they are a god at video games because they can press m1 and camp hooks.  This game is the most casual "competitive game" if you can call it that I have ever played, and it blows my mind how many people actually think they are playing grand master starcraft 2 or something.  Only reason people play this still is because there is no other game like it on the market, and no new or interesting multiplayer games have came out in a while.  The video game industry sucks balls right now and people are forced to play these shitty, buggy, broken ass games because there actually is nothing else out there.

Anyways love the game.

This game has a reputation of being unfair, unbalanced, and unfun. Sometimes it is. But overall, in my experience I've found that the feeling of either bamboozling a person with tons of power or outplaying and hard-reading foolish weaklings is so rewarding that overall the game is fun.

Haben Sie Geld welches Sie nicht leiden können? Dann ist Dead by daylight perfekt für Sie! Wir können Ihnen anbieten von einem Killer von der anderen Seite der Map gehittet zuwerden, Killer können Sie von 5 Kilometern einfach anhitten und Killer sind (meistens) schneller als Sie. Wenn Sie jetzt das ganze Paket haben möchten legen wir auch noch Camper und sogar Teammates dazu welche gerade mal in der Lage sind ihre Hände ohne Hilfe zu waschen. JA Sie haben richtig gehört camper Killer und Teammates die einen IQ von einer frischen Wiese haben. Also investieren Sie jetzt in die größte Geldverschwendung Ihres Lebens!
